title: B2B Source
description: This Data Type is used to capture B2B/CRM Source identifiers.

systemID.title: System ID
systemID.description: This is an identifier for the source system itself and potentially includes the object type.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: This is the row id for the fragment (of whatever type it is).It could be row id for the contact, account, lead etc.
